Description: Oil leakage in the hydraulic system, potentially affecting lift and digging capabilities.
Description_gr: Διαρροή λαδιού στο υδραυλικό σύστημα, που μπορεί να επηρεάσει τις δυνατότητες ανύψωσης και εκσκαφής.
Precaution: Avoid using the excavator until the hydraulic system is repaired to prevent further damage.
Precaution_gr: Αποφύγετε τη χρήση του εκσκαφέα μέχρι να επισκευαστεί το υδραυλικό σύστημα για να αποτρέψετε περαιτέρω ζημιές.

Description: Tracks showing signs of wear, potentially leading to poor movement and instability.
Description_gr: Φθορά στις ερπύστριες, που μπορεί να οδηγήσει σε κακή κίνηση και αστάθεια.
Precaution: Ensure the machine is kept on stable ground until repairs are made.
Precaution_gr: Βεβαιωθείτε ότι το μηχάνημα παραμένει σε σταθερό έδαφος μέχρι να πραγματοποιηθούν οι επισκευές.

Description: Engine temperature rises beyond safe levels.
Description_gr: Η θερμοκρασία του κινητήρα ανεβαίνει πέρα από τα ασφαλή επίπεδα.
Precaution: Allow the machine to cool before operating; check coolant levels and radiator.
Precaution_gr: Αφήστε το μηχάνημα να κρυώσει πριν το λειτουργήσετε. Ελέγξτε τα επίπεδα ψυκτικού υγρού και το ψυγείο.

Description: The hydraulic pump fails to operate, causing issues with lifting and pushing.
Description_gr: H υδραυλική αντλία αποτυγχάνει να λειτουργήσει, προκαλώντας προβλήματα στην ανύψωση και την ώθηση.
Precaution: Stop using the machine immediately and contact a technician for repair.
Precaution_gr: Σταματήστε άμεσα τη χρήση του μηχανήματος και επικοινωνήστε με έναν τεχνικό για επισκευή.

Description: Blade is not aligned correctly, reducing the effectiveness of grading and pushing materials.
Description_gr: Η λεπίδα δεν είναι σωστά ευθυγραμμισμένη, μειώνοντας την αποτελεσματικότητα στη διαμόρφωση και την ώθηση υλικών.
Precaution: Do not operate until blade realignment is completed.
Precaution_gr: Μην λειτουργείτε το μηχάνημα μέχρι να ολοκληρωθεί η ευθυγράμμιση της λεπίδας.

Description: Track damage or detachment.
Precaution: Stop the machine immediately to prevent further damage and ensure safety.
Precaution_gr: Σταματήστε άμεσα το μηχάνημα για να αποτρέψετε περαιτέρω ζημιές και να διασφαλίσετε την ασφάλεια.

Description: Leak in the boom arm's hydraulic system.
Precaution: Limit use to light tasks until fixed; avoid heavy lifting.

Description: Engine stalls under load or during operation.
Precaution: Do not continue operating; inspect fuel and air filter systems.

Description: The front bucket fails to lift or operates slowly.
Precaution: Avoid overloading the bucket; perform hydraulic checks.

Description: The blade fails to raise or lower.
Precaution: Do not use for grading until the mechanism is repaired.

Description: Difficulty steering, resulting in poor control over the grading.
Precaution: Limit movement and use a spotter for guidance.

Description: Tires are excessively worn, leading to poor traction and handling.
Precaution: Inspect and replace tires before further use.

Description: Failure of the mechanism to raise the dump body.
Precaution: Do not attempt to dump until repaired; use manual dumping if possible.

Description: Brakes become unresponsive or weak.
Precaution: Avoid heavy loads; immediately stop the truck for repairs.

Description: The engine temperature exceeds the normal operating range.
Precaution: Let the engine cool and inspect coolant levels.

Description: Failure of the hydraulic arm to lift or move material.
Precaution: Avoid using the loader for lifting until hydraulic issues are resolved.

Description: The drive motor loses power or malfunctions.
Precaution: Limit operation and contact the maintenance team for inspection.

Description: Tire loses air pressure, affecting mobility and stability.
Precaution: Do not operate the machine on uneven surfaces until the tire is repaired.

Description: The crane boom fails to extend, retract, or rotate properly.
Precaution: Do not lift any loads until the boom is repaired or inspected.

Description: Worn or frayed lifting cables, increasing the risk of failure.
Precaution: Do not use the crane for lifting until the cable is replaced.

Description: The road limiter fails to detect or control the weight of the lifted load.
Precaution: Avoid lifting heavy loads; repair the load limiter system immediately.

Description: Battery loses charge too quickly or fails to hold charge.
Precaution: Ensure proper charging intervals and avoid heavy lifting when the battery is low.

Description: Oil leaks from the hydraulic system, affecting lift height and speed.
Precaution: Inspect system regularly and avoid lifting until fixed.

Description: Difficulty in steering the forklift, reducing control and maneuverability.
Precaution: Inspect the steering components and do not operate until repaired.

Description: The conveyor belt stops or moves erratically, preventing the smooth distribution of asphalt.
Precaution: Do not continue paving until the conveyor belt is fixed.

Description: Auger jams or material distribution becomes uneven.
Precaution: Clear jams and ensure uniform material delivery before continuing.

Description: The screed fails to heat properly, causing uneven paving.
Precaution: Stop paving until the screed is repaired.

Description: The roller fails to vibrate, impacting its compacting ability.
Precaution: Do not operate the role for compaction until the system is repaired.

Description: Tires become worn or punctured, affecting the roller's performance.
Precaution: Inspect tires and replace as necessary before continuing operation.

Description: Engine power drops, causing poor performance.
Precaution: Stop the roller and inspect the engine and fuel systems.

Description: The cutter head fails to rotate or works inefficiently.
Precaution: Do not use until repaired to avoid road damage.

Description: Blockage in the conveyor belt system, preventing material from being removed efficiently.
Precaution: Stop and clear the conveyor system before continuing.

Description: Loss of hydraulic pressure, affecting cutting performance.
Precaution: Avoid heavy duty cutting until the hydraulic system is fixed.

Description: Failure of the aggregate feed system, causing uneven or insufficient material mixing.
Precaution: Stop production and fix the feed mechanism.

Description: The drum fails to rotate, making it impossible to mix concrete.
Precaution: Do not use the mixer until the motor or gearbox is repaired.

Description: Failure of the hydraulic system that controls the tipping mechanism.
Precaution: Ensure the mixer is stabilized before servicing.

Fault: Engine Stalling or Failing to Start
Description: Engine fails to start or stalls during operation.
Precaution: Check fuel and electrical systems before further use.

Description: Concrete blocks the pump line, preventing smooth flow.
Precaution: Clear the blockage carefully; inspect the lines for cracks.

Description: Loss of hydraulic pressure, making it impossible to pump concrete.
Precaution: Avoid using until hydraulic issues are resolved

Description: Inconsistent delivery of aggregates due to conveyor or feeder malfunctions.
Precaution: Inspect the delivery system and avoid batching until resolved.

Description: The pile-driving hammer fails to operate correctly or at full power.
Precaution: Ensure the area is safe before attempting repairs; do not use until fixed.

Description: The pile is not driven vertically, affecting structural integrity.
Precaution: Re-align the pile driver and ensure accurate pile placement.

Description: The drill bit wears out, causing inefficiency in drilling operations.
Precaution: Replace the bit before continuing operations.

Description: Hydraulic system failure, affecting drill operation.
Precaution: Stop drilling operations and inspect the hydraulic system.

Description: The roller fails to produce the necessary vibration for compaction.
Precaution: Do not continue compaction operations until repaired.

Description: The engine loses power, reducing roller performance.
Precaution: Inspect the fuel and engine systems before further use.

Description: Blockage in the paving mold, affecting concrete placement.
Precaution: Clear the blockage and inspect the mold for damage.

Description: Failure of the vibrator, preventing proper concrete consolidation.
Precaution: Repair or replace the vibrator system before use.

Description: Failure in the shoring system, leading to instability in the trench.
Precaution: Reinforce the support system before continuing work.

Description: Hydraulic leak in the trenching or shoring system.
Precaution: Fix the hydraulic issue before resuming operation.

Description: Loss of hydraulic pressure, affecting splitting efficiency.
Precaution: Avoid further use until the pressure issue is resolved.

Description: Material becomes jammed in the crusher, causing a blockage.
Precaution: Clear the blockage carefully and inspect for any damage.

Description: The crusher motor fails, halting crushing operations.
Precaution: Repair the motor or check for electrical faults.
